snippet: Kevin L. James, a gay Republican, is a candidate for mayor of Los Angeles, and members of his party see an outside chance to grab what could be a spirit-lifting victory.
abstract: Kevin L James, a gay Republican talk show host, is a candidate for mayor of Los Angeles, and members of his party see an outside chance to grab what could be a spirit-lifting victory; James is positioned in crowded field to squeeze into a two-way runoff in March.
lead_paragraph: Kevin L. James, a gay Republican, is a candidate for mayor of Los Angeles, and members of his party see an outside chance to grab what could be a spirit-lifting victory.

headline.seo: Kevin L. James a Long Shot in Race for Mayor of Los Angeles
headline.main: Battered California Republicans Find Hope in a Long Shot
headline.print_headline: Battered California G.O.P. Finds Hope in a Long Shot
